name: Light Path (evolvoodoo)
description:
Light Path is a short suspense puzzle experience in 3 levels. You will pick up new energies for your fancy flashlight in each level that will allow you to solve the end puzzles. You will be doing this while trying to not get killed by your sleep-paralysis demon. Are they just around the corner? Or is that the goal? Try and find out. Have fun.

The game was built as a part of a team for HCC_GAME_1306 I was the project lead and majority contributor. 

This is my first complete game. Please have fun, please rip it to shreds if you feel necessary. Let me know if you enjoyed it :)
